price: Gonkumaa isa (masjiidicha) keessa hin dhaabbatin. masjiida guyyaa jalqabaa irraa sodaa (Rabbii) irratti bu'ureeffametu ati isa keessa dhaabbachuu haqa godhata. Isa keessa namoota qulqulleeffachuu jaalatantu jiru. Rabbiin qulqulleeffattoota jaalata. {2}
arabic: لَا تَقُمۡ فِيهِ أَبَدٗاۚ لَّمَسۡجِدٌ أُسِّسَ عَلَى ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ مِنۡ أَوَّلِ يَوۡمٍ أَحَقُّ أَن تَقُومَ فِيهِۚ فِيهِ رِجَالٞ يُحِبُّونَ أَن يَتَطَهَّرُواْۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُطَّهِّرِينَ
footnotes: {2} masgiinni sodaa Rabbiirratti bu'ureeffame masgiida qubaati. moggaa madiinaatti argama sadarkaa guddaa qaba.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lā taqum fīhi abadan lamasjidun ussisa ʿalā al-taqwā min awwali yawmin aḥaqqu an taqūma fīhi fīhi rijālun yuḥibbūna an yataṭahharū wal-lahu yuḥibbu al-muṭahirīna
